Name: Cooked Oyster
Description: The meat inside is tender, warm and well salted.

DescriptionLocalization.es: La carne por dentro es tierna, tibia y bien salada.
DescriptionLocalization.ko: 안의 고기는 부드럽고 따뜻하며 소금에 절였습니다.
DescriptionLocalization.de: Das Fleisch im Inneren ist zart, warm und gut gesalzen.
DescriptionLocalization.fr: La viande à l'intérieur est tendre, chaude et bien salée.
DescriptionLocalization.hu: A benne lévő hús puha, meleg és jól sózott.
DescriptionLocalization.it: La carne all'interno è tenera, tiepida e ben salata.
DescriptionLocalization.ja: 中身は柔らかく、温かく、塩辛いです。
DescriptionLocalization.pt: A carne dentro esta macia, morna e bem salgada.
DescriptionLocalization.ru: Мясо внутри нежное, теплое и хорошо просоленное.
DescriptionLocalization.tr: İçindeki etler yumuşak, sıcak ve iyi tuzlanmış.
